jdbcService.sql: update workflow_instance set definition_id = case when :definitionId is null then definition_id else :definitionId end, parent_id = case when :parentId is null then parent_id else :parentId end, batch_id = case when :batchId is null then batch_id else :batchId end, context_id = case when :contextId is null then context_id else :contextId end, started = case when :started is null then started else :started end, stopped = case when :stopped is null then stopped else :stopped end, environment = case when :environment is null then environment else :environment end, transition_state = case when :transitionState is null then transition_state else :transitionState end, state_id = case when :stateId is null then state_id else :stateId end where id = :id
